text: The following lists events that happened in 1968 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Ásgeir Ásgeirsson, Kristján Eldjárn *Prime Minister - Bjarni Benediktsson ==Events== ==Births== Gunnar Bragi Sveinsson *12 March - Ólafur Gottskálksson, footballer *20 May - Ólafur Kristjánsson, footballer *29 May - Sigríður Ingibjörg Ingadóttir, economist and politician. *9 June - Gunnar Bragi Sveinsson, politician. *25 June - Sigursteinn Gíslason, footballer (d. 2012). *26 June - Guðni Th. Jóhannesson, historian *29 July - Brynhildur Davíðsdóttir, scientist ==Deaths== Jón Leifs *18 June - Nína Tryggvadóttir, artist (b. 1913) *30 July - Jón Leifs, composer, pianist, and conductor (b. 1899) ===Full date missing=== *Gunnfríður Jónsdóttir, sculptor (b. 1889) ==References== Category:1960s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1968 in Iceland
